ItemType.name: (Savoy howitzer restriction bolt)
ItemType.description: This device reduce the maximum fire-rate of installed Savoy howitzers so that Cabbage Corp employees are less likely to blow themselves up.

MiscellaneousDevice.EnhancementAbilities: ;It actually requires speed set to 240 to fully prevent damage

ItemType.name: Savoy M1 howitzer
ItemType.description: The Savoy M1 howitzer was designed to fire light rounds over long ranges. Unfortunately, the weapon overheats if fired continuously.

ItemType.description: The Savoy M2 howitzer was designed to fire dense rounds over long ranges. Unfortunately, the weapon overheats if fired continuously.

ItemType.name: scanning Savoy M1 howitzer
ItemType.description: The Savoy M1 howitzer was designed to fire light rounds over long ranges. Unfortunately, the weapon overheats if fired continuously. This model includes a built-in Microsaur scanner that detects Microsaurs within 3 light-seconds.

ItemType.name: scanning Savoy M2 howitzer
ItemType.description: The Savoy M2 howitzer was designed to fire dense rounds over long ranges. Unfortunately, the weapon overheats if fired continuously. This model includes a built-in Microsaur scanner that detects Microsaurs within 4 light-seconds.

ItemType.name: side-mounted Savoy M1 howitzer
ItemType.description: This Savoy M1 howitzer has been modified for external mounting, and its fire controls are linked to a ship's primary weapon. It was designed to fire light rounds over long ranges. Unfortunately, the weapon overheats if fired continuously.
